# Ignacew Folwarczny

Ignacew Folwarczny  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Parzęczew, within Zgierz County, Łódź Voivodeship, in central Poland. It lies approximately  south-west of Parzęczew,  north-west of Zgierz, and  north-west of the regional capital Łódź.
